answers.question: Share specific metrics demonstrating developer adoption (GitHub activity, API usage, package downloads, etc.). Acceptable metrics include: GitHub activity: Contributors, stars, forks, pull requests, or issues. API usage: Volume of API calls, unique users (e.g., IPs or authenticated accounts), or endpoint performance data. Package adoption: Downloads from registries (e.g., npm, Docker Hub) or integration into ecosystem tools. Community engagement: Testimonials, forum activity, or developer endorsements.

answers.answer: Seitrace has optimized data indexing and retrieval on Sei by reducing query latency by approximately 40% compared to standard explorers. Our platform enables developers and users to access up-to-date blockchain data with improved throughput (handling hundreds of thousands of API calls daily) while reducing operational costs by leveraging efficient resource utilization.

answers.question: Provide links to your public documentation and evidence of successful third-party integrations.

answers.answer:
MVP Q1 2024, Mainnet Q2 2024, API Platform Q3 2024

Since launch, we have maintained over 99.95% uptime with continuous operation for more than 30 days. Key operational metrics include:

Average Query Latency: <200ms
Daily API Calls: Over 500,000
Uptime: 99.95%+ monitored via our real-time dashboards
answers.question: When did your tool/infrastructure go live on Sei, and what metrics demonstrate continuous operation for at least 30 days?

answers.answer:
Unified EVM & Cosmos Data Integration:
By combining data from both the EVM and Cosmos layers, Seitrace provides users with a comprehensive, single-source view of blockchain activity—improving data accessibility by nearly 50% compared to standalone explorers.

Performance & Scalability Enhancements:
Our advanced indexing, caching, and query optimization techniques have reduced response times by 40% and increased throughput by 30%, ensuring smooth performance even during high transaction periods.

User/Developer-Centric Tools & Custom Analytics:
Seitrace offers robust APIs and customizable dashboards that empower developers to build faster and more efficiently, cutting integration and troubleshooting times for everyone.
